name: SPACE VALET (RhythmLynx)
description:
The billionaires of your planet have colonized, commercialized and privatized the moon. Your only shot of getting to go there is to work the same shitty job you do back home, but in space, which is much cooler. It'll be worth it. Definitely.

Rich people will come and go as they please. You need to park and later return their personal spacecraft for them. The faster you respond, the more they'll tip you. Try to earn as many space credits as you can during your shift!

Move: WASD / Gamepad left stick
Jump: Spacebar / Gamepad south button (Xbox A)
Enter/exit spacecraft: E / Gamepad north button (Xbox Y)

Made for the GitHub Game Off 2020 game jam over the course of November 2020. Theme: 'moonshot'.
The source code of this project is freely available under the MIT license.
Check the Twitter thread to see how development progressed, with a mini postmortem at the end.
The visual assets are from public domain packs created by Kenney.
